root: ^I thought you were a dragon! Sorry
^I can’t see too well in here anymore!
^Are you one of the people that keeps coming to the
^volcano and smoking? There is a strict no-smoking policy
^here but people keep breaking the rules!
^It wasn’t me! I’d never smoke here! Are you okay? That battle was lit!
^Yeah I’m okay! That battle was crackling! My name is Inferno by the way.
^Thanks Inferno! I just met another dragon – do you want to be our friend?
